title: Scene from the Scottish Highlands
provenance_text: Andrew Dasburg [1887-1979], Taos, NM, 1927; with Maynard Walker Galleries as agent, New York, 1930?; Mrs. George M. Moffett, 1930? until 1940?. By descent to George M. Moffett, Jr., 1930? until 1952?. (Maynard Walker Galleries [1847-1973], New York, NY, 1952? until 1953?). G. David Thompson, Pittsburgh, 1952? until 1959. Gift to Museum, 1959.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
